synthetic_benchmark.title: Synthetic Benchmark (8×8 random images)
synthetic_benchmark.description: We compare how quickly the spatial TinyUNet and the spectral version learn to reconstruct tiny synthetic images.

cifar_benchmark.title: CIFAR-10 Reconstruction Benchmark
cifar_benchmark.description: Same comparison on real CIFAR-10 data to show the accuracy vs. training speed trade-off.

taguchi_analysis.title: Taguchi Factor Sweep
taguchi_analysis.description: We run a Taguchi orthogonal array to see which frequency-processing settings and sampler choices matter most for convergence speed.
